doc.text: The projection matrix to use. By default, creates an orthographic projection with a scale of 1.  (Everything from 0 to image width/height is projected onto the image).

doc.summary: Gets the vertex sorting to use.
doc.text: Gets the vertex sorting to use. Defaults to <ref cls="com/mojang/blaze3d/vertex/VertexSorting" field="ORTHOGRAPHIC_Z">VertexSorting#ORTHOGRAPHIC_Z</ref>.
The modelView matrix to use. Do not confuse with the transformation matrix.

doc.summary: Sets up initial transformation on the <ref cls="com/mojang/blaze3d/vertex/PoseStack">PoseStack</ref>.
doc.text: Sets up initial transformation on the <ref cls="com/mojang/blaze3d/vertex/PoseStack">PoseStack</ref>. These transformations will be accounted  for when projecting points in <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/render/target/RenderJob" method="renderOverlay" type="(com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack,net.minecraft.client.renderer.MultiBufferSource,org.moddingx.libx.render.target.RenderJob.Projector)void">#renderOverlay(PoseStack, MultiBufferSource, Projector)</ref>.

doc.summary: Gets whether this render job uses an overlay.
doc.text: Gets whether this render job uses an overlay.

parameters.name: projector
parameters.doc: A point projector that can project points in the 3 dimensional space used in                   <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/render/target/RenderJob" method="render" type="(com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack,net.minecraft.client.renderer.MultiBufferSource)void">#render(PoseStack, MultiBufferSource)</ref> to the two-dimensional space after projection.

doc.summary: Renders an overlay over the scene.
doc.text:
Renders an overlay over the scene. This is useful if the scene used a non-orthographic projection matrix (ie a 3d scene). This method is always called with an orthographic projection matrix to render a 2d overlay
over the scene. The viewport ranges from (0,0) to (width,height).
In order for this to be called, #usesOverlay() must return true

doc.summary: A render job defines the logic on how to render a scene into an image.
doc.text: A render job defines the logic on how to render a scene into an image. Can be used with <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/render/target/ImageHelper">ImageHelper</ref>.
